data.Sentence_cn: 幽灵之死
data.Sentence: --- lesson 30  The death of a ghost

data.Sentence_cn: 多年来，村民们一直认为恩得利农场在闹鬼。
data.Sentence: For years, villagers believed that Endley Farm was haunted.

data.Sentence_cn: 恩得利农场属于乔.考科斯和鲍勃.考科斯兄弟俩所有。
data.Sentence: The farm was owned by two brothers, Joe and Bob Cox.

data.Sentence_cn: 他们雇了几个农工，但谁也不愿意在那儿长期工作下去。
data.Sentence: They employed a few farmhands, but no one was willing to work there long.

data.Sentence_cn: 每次雇工辞职后都叙述着同样的故事。
data.Sentence: Every time a worker gave up his job, he told the same story.

data.Sentence_cn: 雇工们说，常常一早起来发现有人在夜里把活干了，
data.Sentence: Farm labourers said that they always woke up to find that work had been done overnight.

data.Sentence_cn: 干草已切好，牛棚也打扫干净了。
data.Sentence: Hay had been cut and cowsheds had been cleaned.

data.Sentence_cn: 有一个彻夜未眠的雇工还声称他看见一个人影在月光下收割庄稼。
data.Sentence: A farm worker, who stayed up all night claimed to have seen a figure cutting corn in the moonlight.

data.Sentence_cn: 随着时间的流逝，考科斯兄弟雇了一个尽心尽责的鬼，他们家的活大部分都让鬼给干了，这件事成了公认的事实。
data.Sentence: In time, it became an accepted fact that the Cox brothers employed a conscientious ghost that did most of their work for them.

data.Sentence_cn: 谁也没想到农场竟会有一个从未露面的人。
data.Sentence: No one suspected that there might be someone else on the farm who had never been seen.

data.Sentence_cn: 但事实上确有此人。
data.Sentence: This was indeed the case.

data.Sentence_cn: 不久之前，村民们惊悉恩得利农场的鬼死了。
data.Sentence: A short time ago, villagers were astonished to learn that the ghost of Endley had died.

data.Sentence_cn: 大家都去参加了葬礼，因为那“鬼”不是别人，正是农场主的兄弟埃里克.考科斯。人们以为埃里克年轻时就死了。
data.Sentence: Everyone went to the funeral, for the 'ghost' was none other than Eric Cox, a third brother who was supposed to have died as a young man.

data.Sentence_cn: 葬礼之后，乔和鲍勃透露了他们保守了长达50多年的秘密。
data.Sentence: After the funeral, Joe and Bob revealed a secret which they had kept for over fifty years.

data.Sentence_cn: 埃里克是这家长子。年龄比他两个弟弟大很多，
data.Sentence: Eric had been the eldest son of the family, very much older than his two brothers.

data.Sentence_cn: 第二次世界大战期间被迫参军。
data.Sentence: He had been obliged to join the army during the Second World War.

data.Sentence_cn: 他讨厌军旅生活，决定逃离所在部队。
data.Sentence: As he hated army life, he decided to desert his regiment.

data.Sentence_cn: 当他了解自己将被派遣出国时，他逃回农场，父亲把他藏了起来，直到战争结束。
data.Sentence: When he learnt that he would be sent abroad, he returned to the farm and his father hid him until the end of the war.

data.Sentence_cn: 由于害怕当局，埃里克战后继续深藏不露。
data.Sentence: Fearing the authorities, Eric remained in hiding after the war as well.

data.Sentence_cn: 他的父亲告诉大家，埃里克在战争中被打死了。
data.Sentence: His father told everybody that Eric had been killed in action.

data.Sentence_cn: 除此之外，只有乔与鲍知道这个秘密。
data.Sentence: The only other people who knew the secret were Joe and Bob.

data.Sentence_cn: 但他俩连自己的妻子都没告诉。
data.Sentence: They did not even tell their wives.

data.Sentence_cn: 父亲死后，他们兄弟俩认为有责任继续把埃里克藏起来。
data.Sentence: When their father died, they thought it their duty to keep Eric in hiding.

data.Sentence_cn: 这些年来，埃里克过着隐士生活，
data.Sentence: All these years, Eric had lived as a recluse.

data.Sentence_cn: 白天睡觉，夜里出来干活，一点不知道自己已成了恩得利家场的活鬼。
data.Sentence: He used to sleep during the day and work at night, quite unaware of the fact that he had become the ghost of Endley.

data.Sentence_cn: 他死后，他的弟弟们才觉得无法再保守这个秘密了。
data.Sentence: When he died, however, his brothers found it impossible to keep the secret any longer.
